version_description:
What’s New in Version 2.11.0
What’s New
• Fresh from the oven #1 - Our app’s new and improved look is now available.
• Fresh from the oven #2 - From today, you can use the monyx app from you apple watch!
Bug fixes
• Fixed: Random and rare crashes occurring on launch.
• Fixed: You can, once more, arrange your payment methods display by ‘order of use’. The last payment method with which you’ve completed a transaction will be displayed first (yay!).
• Fixed: Sending our support team an issue was proving to be quite tricky. We are now back to normal, keep those complaints coming, your feedback is valuable to us!
• Created new bugs to fix in next version.

What’s New
• Fresh from the oven – You can now delete a machine from your machine gallery
• Added updates to card’s transaction screen (yay!)
• Our toast messages received a new and improve look.

Bug fixes
• Fixed: Your punch cards will be displayed, once more, by their order of use. You will now be able to track you punch cards more easily!
• Fixed: Registering a long e-mail was proving to be quite tricky. No matter how long your e-mail is, you will now be able to add it!
